resources.string:
What to do.
\ The aim of the game is simple: destroy all robots and get the next level. Higher level - more robots. More robots - more interest.
\ How to achieve that.
\ Our developers worked out game process and included a lot of features in this game: teleport, safe teleport, mines and bombs. Using all that correctly, you'll quickly learn to play good and reach the top of players rating.
\ What is what.
\ If you are incredibly clever, you can skip this part. But we advice you not to do this.
\ Teleport - is the only opportunity to lose in safe game mode. Using teleport, you can relocate to the cell with cruel robot. And die there.
\ Safe teleport - costs energy, relocates you to the cell, where you guaranteed won't be killed by robot. But it doesn't mean that after next movement robot will not reach you.
\ Mine -
\ Bomb - energy-intensive thing, that allows you to stay alive longer, by desroying all robots, threatening you during the next movement. Junk near you will be exploded also.
\ What else?
\ When robots encounter, junk appears. When robot encounters junk, junk remains.
\ You can push junks on robots, or hide behind them.
\ Fast (blue) robots can make two steps during one movement.
\ When you turn safe movements off, you turn off higher power that prevents your misstep. In safe mode, you can't come close to robots. As we do in the zoo.
\ Field is scalable. 
\ Warning! Game is almost endless. You can't win. But you can score more points than your friend and raise your self-esteem by that.
\
